name: Bluetail (1998-; NFT/SVG Version, 3.30.2021)
description: "Bluetail" (1998-), a previously unpublished cousin of @Golan Levin’s "Yellowtail" software, is an interactive system for the gestural creation and performance of real-time abstract animation. The software repeats the movement of a mark between its endpoints, allowing the simultaneous specification of a line’s shape and quality of movement. Each line repeats according to its own period, producing an ever-changing display of lively, worm-like textures. This is the official SVG/NFT version.
